text: (Your mom wakes you up from your sleep.)

name: You
text: What is it mom? Why are you up this early?

name: Mom
text: We need to leave early and pack our things.

name: Mom
text: There has been an exponential increase of infected here in our area and we need to move to a safer place.

name: Mom
text: We wont be able to stay here as long as these vicious creatures live. We a safer and more permanent place.

name: You
text: Do you mean something like a bunker or a safe of sorts?

name: Dad
text: Oh I know something. Theres this military bunker somewhere far away. I know this because I have a coworker that has a brother that works for the military.

name: Dad
text: I presume it's empty right now because of the virus. We should get there fast as other people would also have the same idea of going to a bunker.

name: Dad
text: If we can secure that place early, we'll be set for this pandemic. There will probably an abundance of MRE and food supplies there for military purposes.

name: You
text: I mean if there is a place where we can stay for rest of this pandemic with the surplus of food and water, there must some kind of catch. Right?

name: Dad
text: You do have a point. But we have no other choice or else we will be stranded here. Our benefits overweight over disadvantages.

name: Dad
text: Once were stranded here, our food and water supplies will dry out as we keep going. It basically suicide with extra steps.

name: Mom
text: It's settled then, we will be setting out in a few minutes. Pack your things and help your sister do hers.
